translation.sql_textarea_label: Text field for your SQL query
translation.no_expected_output_for_task: There is nt expected output for the task

tasks.select_all_invoices: Select the list of all invoices with all their attributes.
tasks.select_all_artists: Select the list of all artists with all their attributes.
tasks.select_all_artists_names: Select the list of all artists' names.
tasks.select_first_and_last_name_of_employees: Select the list of first and last names of all employees.
tasks.select_employees_sorted_by_hire_date_des: Select the list of all employees with all their attributes. Sort the list by hire date in descending order.
tasks.select_first_and_last_name_of_employees_: Select the list of first and last names of all employees. Sort the list by hire date in ascending order.
tasks.select_names_and_length_of_tracks_sorted: Select the list of titles (column name) and length (column milliseconds) of all tracks. Order the list by track title in alphabetical order. For tracks with a same name sort them by length in descending order.
tasks.select_employees_title_support_agent: Select the list of first and last names of all employees with Sales Support Agent title .
tasks.select_tracks_bigger_than_100000000_byte: Select titles of tracks (column name), which size exceeds 100000000 bytes.
tasks.select_tracks_smaller_than_500000_bytes: Select titles of tracks (column name), which size is lower than 500000 bytes.
tasks.select_tracks_between_500000_and_5000000: Select titles of tracks (column name), which size is between 500000 and 5000000 bytes.
tasks.select_employees_before_15_feb_2011: Select the list of hire dates, first and last names of all employees which were hired before 15th February 2011.
tasks.select_employees_last_names_starting_wit: Select the list of all employees with all their attributes, whos names start with an A.
tasks.select_employees_first_names_ending_with: Select the list of all employees with all their attributes, whos nams end with a.
tasks.select_employees_with_address_contains_A: Select the list of all employees with all their attributes, whos billing addresses contain Ave.
tasks.select_invoices_from_canada_ab: Select the list of all invoives with all their attributes, where billing country is Canada and billing state is AB.
tasks.select_invoices_from_nv_reno_with_total_: Select the list of all invoives with all their attributes, where billing state is NV, billing city is Reno and total equals $5.
tasks.select_invoices_from_states_nv_or_ab: Select the list of all invoives with all their attributes, where billing state is NV or AB.
tasks.select_tracks_without_composer: Select the list of all tracks with all their attributes, where composer is not set.
tasks.select_customers_with_company: Select the list of all customers with all their attributes, which have a company set.
tasks.select_invoices_germany_ordered_total_de: Select top-3 invoices by total. Filter the list by country, it have to be equal to Germany. Select all attributes of all invoices.
tasks.select_billing_address_invoices_ca_cuper: Select top-3 invoices by total. Filter the list by billing state to be CA and billing city to be Cupertino. For all invoices select only billing address.
tasks.select_id_invoices_ca_cupertino_or_mount: Select ID of an invoice with lowest total. Its billing state have to be CA and billing city have to be Mountain View or Cupertino.
tasks.count_customers_by_country: Select the list of all countries and amount of customers in each country.
tasks.count_tracks_by_unit_price: Select unit prices and amount of all tracks of each price.
tasks.count_tracks_by_unit_price_ordered_asc: Like in previous task, select unit prices and amount of all tracks of each price. Sort the list from lowest to highest price.
tasks.count_tracks_by_unit_price_ordered_asc_l: Change the previous solution to show only the price with lowest amount of tracks.
tasks.join_artists_names_and_album_titles: Select all artists names with all their albums titles.
tasks.join_album_titles_and_tracks_titles: Select all album titles and all tracks titles in each album.
tasks.join_artists_names_and_album_titles_orde: Select all artists names and their albums titles. Sort the list by artist name in reverse alphabetical order.
tasks.join_customer_name_and_total_ordered_by_: Select all first and last names of all customers and their invoices totals. Sort the list by total from highest to lowest.
tasks.select_all_aerosmith_albums: Select all albums titles of Aerosmith band.
tasks.select_all_albums_with_midnight_track: Select all albums titles, which contains track with title Midnight.
tasks.select_all_artists_with_midnight_track: Select all artist names, who have track with title Midnight. Remember that you can use JOIN twice or more times.
tasks.count_iron_maiden_albums: Count the number of albums of Iron Maiden band.
tasks.count_each_albums_of_artists: Count the number of albums of each artist. Sort artists by ID.
tasks.artist_with_max_albums: Select the artist with most amount of albums. Find it name and the amount of albums.
tasks.select_top5_clients_with_most_sum_of_inv: Select top-5 customers with higher sum of totals of their invoices.
tasks.select_products_above_average_price: Find all products with price above the average price.
tasks.select_customers_with_orders: Select all customers who have placed at least one order.
tasks.select_products_never_ordered: Find products that have never been ordered.
tasks.select_most_expensive_product_per_catego: Find the most expensive product in each category.
tasks.select_customers_above_average_spending: Select customers whose total spending is above average.
tasks.select_products_with_above_average_revie: Find products with average rating above the overall average.
tasks.select_suppliers_with_low_stock_products: Find suppliers that have products with low stock (< 20 units).
tasks.cte_total_sales_per_customer: Using CTE, calculate total sales per customer and join with customer details.
tasks.cte_category_revenue: Using CTE, calculate revenue by category.
tasks.cte_top_customers_by_tier: Using CTE, find average order value per loyalty tier.
tasks.cte_multiple_customer_product_stats: Using multiple CTEs, find customers with more than 2 orders.
tasks.cte_recursive_category_hierarchy: Using recursive CTE, display the full category hierarchy path.
tasks.window_row_number_customers_by_registrat: Assign row numbers to customers based on registration date.
tasks.window_rank_products_by_price: Rank products by price from highest to lowest.
tasks.window_dense_rank_products_by_category: Rank products within each category by price.
tasks.window_running_total_orders: Calculate running total of order amounts over time.
tasks.window_moving_average_sales: Calculate 3-period moving average of order amounts.
tasks.window_lead_lag_order_comparison: Compare each order with previous and next orders for the same customer.
tasks.window_first_last_value_customer_orders: Find first and last order amounts for each customer.
tasks.window_ntile_customer_segments: Divide customers into 4 quartiles based on total spending.
tasks.aggregate_having_clause: Find categories with average product price greater than 500.
tasks.aggregate_multiple_functions: Calculate multiple aggregates for customer orders (count, min, max, avg).
tasks.aggregate_group_by_multiple_columns: Count customers by country and loyalty tier.
tasks.aggregate_conditional_count: Count total orders and delivered orders per customer.
tasks.join_left_outer_customers_orders: Show all customers with their order counts, including those with no orders.
tasks.join_self_find_customers_same_city: Find pairs of customers from the same city.
tasks.join_cross_product_combinations: Create combinations of top-level categories and suppliers.
tasks.advanced_top_selling_products: Find top 5 best-selling products with category and revenue details.
tasks.advanced_product_performance_by_supplier: Analyze product performance grouped by supplier.
tasks.advanced_monthly_sales_trend: Show monthly sales trends with order count and revenue.
tasks.advanced_customer_retention_analysis: Analyze customer retention with first/last order dates.
tasks.advanced_product_review_analysis: Analyze products by review ratings and sales volume.
tasks.advanced_category_hierarchy_sales: Calculate sales by parent and child category.
tasks.advanced_discount_impact_analysis: Analyze the impact of discounts on sales.
tasks.advanced_payment_method_preference: Analyze payment method usage and transaction statistics.
tasks.advanced_stock_alert_system: Create a stock alert system with status categories.
tasks.advanced_cte_window_customer_ranking: Rank customers by spending using CTEs and window functions.
tasks.advanced_product_cohort_analysis: Perform cohort analysis on customer retention.
tasks.sql3_rollup_sales_hierarchy: Calculate hierarchical sales totals by country and city using ROLLUP.
tasks.sql3_cube_multi_dimensional: Generate multi-dimensional sales analysis by loyalty tier and year using CUBE.
tasks.sql3_grouping_sets_flexible: Create flexible grouping combinations for sales analysis using GROUPING SETS.
tasks.sql3_ntile_quartiles: Segment customers into spending quartiles using NTILE window function.
tasks.sql3_first_last_value: Find the longest and shortest track in each album using FIRST_VALUE and LAST_VALUE.
tasks.sql3_nth_value: Retrieve the third largest track by size using NTH_VALUE window function.
tasks.sql3_percent_rank: Calculate the percentile rank of customers by total spending using PERCENT_RANK.
tasks.sql3_cume_dist: Compute cumulative distribution of track lengths using CUME_DIST function.
tasks.sql3_lateral_join: Find customers with recent orders using LATERAL join.
tasks.sql3_window_range_preceding: Calculate 7-day rolling average of order amounts using window ranges.
tasks.sql3_pivot_simulation: Pivot monthly sales data into columns by month using CASE statements.
tasks.sql3_recursive_numbers: Generate a sequence of numbers with their squares and cubes using recursive CTE.
tasks.sql3_recursive_date_series: Create a date series for January 2024 with day of week using recursive CTE.
tasks.sql3_moving_aggregate: Calculate running total and 30-day moving average using window functions.
tasks.sql3_dense_rank_gaps: Compare RANK vs DENSE_RANK behavior with track sizes.
tasks.sql3_window_filter_qualify: Find top 5 customers per loyalty tier by spending using window filtering.
tasks.sql3_lag_lead_comparison: Compare customer order amounts with previous and next orders using LAG and LEAD.
tasks.sql3_percentile_cont: Calculate median, Q1, and Q3 of track durations using PERCENTILE_CONT.
tasks.sql3_window_frame_groups: Aggregate sales using GROUPS frame specification in window functions.
tasks.sql3_advanced_running_difference: Calculate daily revenue changes and percentage growth rates.
tasks.dw_simple_star_schema_join: Calculate monthly revenue from the data warehouse fact and date dimension tables.
tasks.dw_product_category_sales: Analyze sales by product category and subcategory from dimensional model.
tasks.dw_customer_lifetime_value: Calculate customer lifetime value and purchase count from fact table.
tasks.dw_profitability_analysis: Analyze product category profitability with profit margins.
tasks.dw_time_series_daily_sales: Perform time series analysis of daily sales with rolling averages.
tasks.dw_seasonal_analysis: Analyze seasonal sales patterns by quarter and month.
tasks.dw_customer_segmentation: Segment customers into value tiers using NTILE for RFM analysis.
tasks.dw_top_products_per_category: Find top 3 products in each category by revenue using window ranking.
tasks.dw_customer_retention_cohort: Perform cohort analysis on customer retention from first purchase date.
tasks.dw_abc_analysis: Classify products into ABC categories based on cumulative revenue contribution.
tasks.dw_basket_analysis: Calculate average basket size and value for transaction analysis.
tasks.dw_customer_rfm_analysis: Perform RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) segmentation for customer analysis.
tasks.dw_slowly_changing_dimension: Query slowly changing dimension (SCD Type 2) for historical customer data.
tasks.dw_kpi_dashboard: Calculate key performance indicators (KPIs) for business dashboard.
tasks.dw_geographic_performance: Analyze geographic sales performance by country and state.
